summary: Modified all footers across the website to match the screenshot design. Created a multi-column footer layout with dark background (#1f2937) and light text. Footer includes three columns: QUICK LINKS (Contact, Leader, Entrepreneur, Creator, Tutor), INFORMATION (Privacy Policy, Terms and Conditions), and CONTACT (email, phone, social media icons). Added CSS styling with proper spacing, hover effects, and responsive design. Replaced image-based social icons with SVG icons for Facebook and Instagram. Footer now has a professional multi-column layout matching the reference design, excluding the RESOURCES section as requested.
current_status: All footers updated across all main pages (index.html, creator.html, tutor.html, leader.html, entrepreneur.html, contact.html, skills.html, projects.html) with new multi-column design. Footer includes Quick Links, Information, and Contact sections with proper styling and responsive layout.
